ERRORS.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
ERRORS.userEmailNotUnique: This email is already in use.
ERRORS.userNotActivated: You have to activate your account.
ERRORS.invalidLogin: The username and password do not match.
ERRORS.userAlreadyInvited: This user is already invited with this email.
ERRORS.userAlreadyExists: There is already a user with this email.

ERROR.email: Email does not seems to be valid
ERROR.minlength: This field needs at least {{minlength}} characters
ERROR.maxlength: This field can only have {{maxlength}} characters
ERROR.min: THe value can not be lower than {{min}}
ERROR.max: THe value can not be higher than {{max}}
ERROR.confirmPassword: The two passwords are not the same
ERROR.passwordNotStrong: The password is not strong enough. The password should at least be 8 characters and contain lowercase letters, uppercase letters, number and symbols to make it strong.
ERROR.passwordsDoNotMatch: The two passwords do not match

CONTENT.liveModeWarning: You are in live mode. Changes you will make will be reflected in the game.

REGISTER.terms: I agree to the terms
REGISTER.success: You are successfully registered. To be able to sign in you need to activate your account. We have send you an email with the instructions on how to activate your account.

ACTIVATE.success: You are now activated. You can login now.
ACTIVATE.error: There went something wrong while activating your account, click the link in your email again please.

GENERAL.title: General game settings
GENERAL.updateInfo: Settings on this page will always be immediately applied to the sandbox and live environment

REGENERATE.title: Are you sure?
REGENERATE.body: Are you sure you want to regenerate the API keys for this game?

USER-LIST.title: Manage users
USER-LIST.resetPasswordSuccess: We have send the user an email with instructions on how to reset their password

DELETE.title: Are you sure?
DELETE.body: Are you sure you want to delete the invitation for: {{email}}?

DELETE.title: Are you sure?
DELETE.body: Are you sure you want to delete the player: {{name}}?

DELETE.title: Are you sure?
DELETE.body: Are you sure you want to delete the achievement: {{name}}?

DELETE.title: Are you sure?
DELETE.body: Are you sure you want to delete the leaderboard: {{name}}?

ACHIEVEMENT-TYPE.singleDescription: A single thing that needs to be completed
ACHIEVEMENT-TYPE.multipleDescription: The player needs to complete or collect multiple things

LEADERBOARD-SCORE-TYPE.latestDescription: The player only has one score on this leaderboard. When you submit a new score for this player it will use this new score
LEADERBOARD-SCORE-TYPE.highestDescription: The player only has one score on this leaderboard. When you submit a new score for this player it will only be updated if that score is higher then it's current score
LEADERBOARD-SCORE-TYPE.multipleDescription: The player has multiple scores on this leaderboard. Every submitted score will be saved
